about_the_game:
In a world gone mad... one egg stands alone against the fowl horde! Can your dual-wielding ovum outlaw survive against an endless army of zombie chickens?


From the makers of the hit web game Shell Shockers comes a single player arcade scramble like no other. Take control of your autofiring hard-boiled hero and battle the chicken villains. Can you survive til the rescue chopper arrives?


Collect golden eggs and crowns to egg-cessorize everything! Unlock new weapons and egg-stra eggatar characters, each with its own unique skill tree! Journey to new chicken zones for even more poultry-pulverizing showdowns!


Madcap arcade mayhem from the guys who made Shell Shockers and Slayaway Camp and Plants vs Zombies, and some other games too.



Confront enormous bosses as you struggle to unlock new apocalyptic zones! Unleash nuclear hell on vast swarms of pecking foes! Become the baddest egg of them all!
